text.p: Secondhand tonnage brokers reported the sale of the following vessels.
BULKERS - Dynasty - (built 1989) 69,133 dwt sold within Japan for $17.4 million.
RORO - Miyako Maru - (built 1983) sold to Indonesian buyers for $6 million.
Riverdance - (built 1977) 3,046 dwt sold to UK buyers for $3 million.
Some of these sales may not be final as they may be subject to inspection, survey or other conditions. --London Newsroom, +44 171 542 8071
